info.title: workspace
info.description: Create team folders with delegated management

get.summary: Return the first 25 workspaces (optional filtering by name)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Optional filter to return workspaces by name

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Optional page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Optional limit of workspaces per page

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

409.description: Workspace with this name already exists

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Returns a workspace by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of a workspace

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

patch.summary: Edit workspace name, color and quota

color.description: Optional - Workspace color in hexadecimal format (example: #f91616).

quota.description: Optional - Workspace quota in bytes. For example: 5368709120 for 5GB or -3 means unlimited.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of a workspace

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: of a workspace to delete

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Returns the users from a workspace

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Users of the specified workspace returned successfully.

401.description: Current user is not logged in

post.summary: Adds users to the workspace by id

uids.description: Represents the user uids to add to the workspace

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Confirmation message indicating that users have been added successfully.

404.description: User not found in the instance.

401.description: Current user is not logged in

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Represents the ID of the workspace

parameters.name: uids[]
parameters.description: Represents the user uids to remove to the workspace

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

204.description: Confirmation for users removed from the workspace.

404.description: User not found in the instance.

401.description: Current user is not logged in

get.summary: Returns the groups associated with a workspace

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

200.description: Groups of the specified workspace returned successfully.

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

409.description: Subgroup with this name already exists

uid.description: Represents the user uid to add as a workspace manager

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass
